actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law allowing automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the salaries of Members of Congress and certain other legislative, executive, and judicial offices and positions.

summary.text: Repeals the existing provisions of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 which authorize automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the salaries of Members of Congress and other specified legislative, executive, and judicial offices and positions.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law allowing automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the salaries of Members of Congress and certain other legislative, executive, and judicial offices and positions.
